name: GMC Gold Mining
description: Gold Mining: your portal for gold purchasing with blockchain technology. The token that is worth gold! GMC represents real gold production with up to 5% profitability based on physical gold mining operations. Discover our gold mining RWA tokens and gold-backed tokens - simple, fast, and secure. Transform Gold into Real Profitability with blockchain-integrated dashboard, staking rewards, affiliate system, and complete transparency. Each token is backed by real gold mining activities with full traceability.

attributes.value: Up to 5% based on real gold production
